data.name: TesserAct - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the music featured in Propelled Bird's TesserAct. 14 tracks are featured, ranging from ambient electronic tracks to ambient guitar, recorded between electronic artist "a beagle" and composer Stuart Tow.

Track Listing:

  • Psalms - a beagle
  • Tension - Stuart Tow
  • Anti-Matter - a beagle
  • Bioluminescence- a beagle
  • Chambers - a beagle
  • Chasms - a beagle
  • Deja Vu - Stuart Tow
  • Demension - a beagle
  • Europa - a beagle
  • Flares - a beagle
  • Ganamede - a beagle
  • Gravity Well - a beagle
  • Aquarius- a beagle
  • Llamas - a beagle

data.short_description: Immerse yourself in the music featured in Propelled Bird's TesserAct. 14 tracks are featured, ranging from ambient electronic tracks to ambient guitar, recorded between electronic artist "a beagle" and composer Stuart Tow.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), or Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2, or equivalent, running at 1.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 1.5 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 256 MB of VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce 7600 GS, ATI Radeon HD 2400 Pro 256 MB, or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 145 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 16-bit
